title: Southern Charm Housewarming / RHONY Upstate Recap!
itunes:title: Southern Charm Housewarming / RHONY Upstate Recap!
itunes:subtitle: Danny recaps this week's Southern Charm & RHONY. Southern Charm featured Chelsea's housewarming where she showed off her Costa Rica-inspired decor, a Kathryn/Whitney reveal, and more. On The Real Housewives of New York, the women are upst...
description:
Danny recaps this week's Southern Charm & RHONY. Southern Charm featured Chelsea's housewarming where she showed off her Costa Rica-inspired decor, a Kathryn/Whitney reveal, and more. On The Real Housewives of New York, the women are upstate seeing a star named Margarita.


#RHONY: 33:30ish


*To support this pod & access bonus eps, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
